PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-05312021-06-10,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  NRCAN,  , 
ActCanadian Energy Regulator Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Pipeline Financial Requirements Regulations
PrecisRegulations amending the PIPELINE FINANCIAL REQUIREMENTS REGULATIONS in order to (1) ensure alignment between the Regulations and the Canadian Energy Regulator Act (CERA) by updating the regulatory references to the terms and provisions of the CERA following the repeal of the National Energy Board (NEB) Act; and (2) reflect the original intent of the Regulations with respect to class 1 oil pipeline operators' financial resource requirement by addressing an oversight in the regulatory text.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0134 Publication Date: 2021-06-23
AttachmentsAttachment
